name: Spatialization
description:
A Bell Corporation Games :

Graphism: https://www.instagram.com/draw_with_capu/
Programation: Bell
----------------------------------------------------------------------
Controls:

E : Interact
R : Character Change
---------------------------------

This game had been realised for the Mini Jam 48 : Teamwork
This is a 2D puzzle game in space. The objective is to reach all doors.

This is my first submission for a Jam and it isn't complete ^^"
Indeed it is my second game created with Unity and the first time for the Graphist

There is only 3 levels availble but we want to finish this game after the Jam !
It was for me a good occasion to use scripts in Unity

Enjoy ! (even if the game is not that good --')
